snippet: One reason the United States has a low voter-participation rate is that most states are using 19th-century registration methods in the 21st century.
abstract: Editorial urges Congress to require that states update their voter registration methods to allow online registration; asserts that online registration would increase voter participation and would help to blunt efforts by some lawmakers to limit voting for short-term political gain.
lead_paragraph: One reason the United States has a low voter-participation rate is that most states are using 19th-century registration methods in the 21st century.
